# Worry Free (Spell)
## Overview
[[Abjuration Spells|Abjuration]]

**Level:** [[1st Level Paladin Spells|Paladin 1]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 1st-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 1]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, DF

**Range:** Personal

**Target:** You

**Duration:** 10 minutes/level

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Spell Compendium (WotC), pg. 47

*A silver glow sheathes your body as you complete the spell. As the glow fades, you feel a touch of the divine at the back of your mind. This divine touch spreads until you feel your concerns and anxieties fade away.*

You gain a +4 sacred bonus on saving throws made against mind-affecting spells and effects.

**GM Note**

*House Rule:* Name changed from *clear mind* to *worry free* to avoid duplication.
